infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to record video vlogs.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio with video vlogs.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to tag your mood entries and vlogs.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow EmoGo to access your camera.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow EmoGo to access your microphone.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow EmoGo to access your location.
